title: Episode 308 - The Prisoners of Nanbu, Part 3
description: This week, the crew of the Breskens is freed at last. Plus some final thoughts on Tokugawa diplomacy.
content:encoded: This week, the crew of the Breskens is freed at last. Plus some final thoughts on Tokugawa diplomacy.
